item.description:
Hi Everyone:  Our very own member and photographer Bob Greene will be showing NINE of his images at the upcoming Illuminations Art Exhibit - read on:

 

Illuminations Opening Reception 
Tuesday June 14, 2011, from 5:30pm-7:00pm (opening remarks at 6:00pm)

Hors d’Oeuvres and light refreshments served.

“Illuminations is a rotating art exhibit housed in the Massachusetts General Hospital Cancer Center, designed to enhance our environment of care.... Works are chosen that shed light on the human experience and inspire viewers to expand their vision of life.”

10th Floor of the Yawkey Center for Outpatient Care
55 Fruit Street, Yawkey 8C, Boston, MA 02114
(The Yawkey Center is steps away from the Charles/MGH Red line T stop. For the night of the opening reception, parking is validated/free for reception guests.)

-- 
Please view my online gallery at www.rdg-art.com

 

Following the reception, let's go across the street to Antonio's of Beacon Hill at 288 Cambridge St., Boston

http://www.antoniosofbeaconhill.com/dinner_menu.html
item.how_to_find_us: 10th floor Yawkey Center for Outpatient Care

item.name: Illuminations Art Gallery with Bob Greene
